soragune wanantharaya sathu idam wana sanrakshana departhamenthuwata ha soragune dewala sathu rajakari idam lesa danata pawathina athara eya welioya wyaparaye pradhana jalaposhitha pradeshaya da we. 1931 anka dahanawaya darana wihara dewalagam aagnya panathata anuwa wiharaya ho dewalaya sathuwa athi rajakari idamwalin ema pujaniya sthanawalata nila panguwa itu nowanne nam pamanak ema idam wenath ayawalunata pawara diya haki namudu wasiyan wisin dewalaya sathu anunawayak wu rajakari itu karamin sitiyadi siya mandiya thara karaganima udesa parampara urumayan nasamin soragune kuda katharagama dewalaya sathu wananthara idam beragala golf risot namathi hotal wyapruthiya ha golf piti idikirima sandaha alfa and omega prayiwat limitad anka 65, dharmapala mawatha, kolambaa 07 yana aayathanaya wetha labadi atha.

ee pradeshaye me karmanthaya ada da tharamak durata pawathwagena yayi.laksha karmanthaya yanu dawa yakada ha wenath loha warigayakata wiwidha warna rata katayam yoda kala haki aalepa kramayaki.kese ho rambaukwalla disawath, dewendra mulacharyawarayath, mulacharyawarayage hithawathaku wana laksha banda namaththek mulkaragena kundasalaya pradeshaye pihiti ‘narikel’ namin handunwana rajuge udyanaye mahanargha raja maligayak thana atha.tharamak us kandugatayaka sampurnayenma dawayen nirmanaya kala raja maligaya ekala diwya wimanayaka siriganwu bawa aithihasika pothpathwala ha puskola pothwala sandahan bawa disanayaka mahatha pamanak nowa narendrasinha rajamaha wiharaye bharakara himiyan wana rambaukwalle sudassi himiyo da thahawuru kalaha.wiwidha kala shilpa upayogi kotagena nirmanaya kala me raja maligaya, raja maligayakata wada kala nikethanayaka sirigath bawath rathri kalayata thanuna thel dummala aadi kalayen soyagath gal warga suwanda dum aadiyen maligaya eekaloka kala wita diwya wimanayaka sirigena thibu bawath parani puskola pothwala sandahanya.aithihasika thorathuru sapayu ke. bi. disanayaka saha aar. wi. el. di. gamini (pali ayiya)ingi්rasin wisin winasha kirimen anathuruwa ithiriwu katayam sahitha dawa kanu rambaukwalle parapure aya galawagena wuth wathman rajamaha wiharasthanaye thewa mandapayak idikota athi athara ema katayam sahitha dawa kandu ada da daknata labe.meyinuth ithiriya, rambaukwalle pansalwalata eka deka yanadi washayen ;bada ema kalawa aaraksha kirima pinisa rambaukwalle parapura wishala mahansiyak gath bawa rambaukwalle sudassi himiyo pawasuha.1800 pamana wana wita ingi්rasin udarata alla ganimata mana balamin siti samayeki.
